_children.body: In allene (C<sub>3</sub>H<sub>4</sub>), the type(s) of hybridisation of the carbon atoms is (are):
_children.explanation: The structure of allene is CH<sub>2</sub> = C = CH<sub>2</sub> . Here both the terminal carbons are sp<sup>2</sup> hybridised while the central carbon is sp hybridised.
